During the last 5 years, have you off work or received treatment for more than a week, or
have you ever had any of the following symptoms that lasted more than a week: fatigue,

PART 6: THE DECLARATION
I/We hereby authorize and grant permission to Dai-ichi Life Insurance Myanmar Ltd. (Dai-ichi Life) that personal
information completed in this Proposal Form can be disclosed, transferred to, and maintained at Head Quarter(s),
competent authority, and other related corporations and/or can be sued for any legal purpose but not limited to
marketing, market research/survey and servicing customer by Dai-ichi Life, its affiliates, business partners. I/We confirm
that every answer I/We have given in this Proposal Form and every declaration to the Dai-ichi Life are true and correct
in all respects. I/We understand that if I omit to disclose any fact, Dai-ichi Life has the right to decline my proposal and
claim.
I have seen a copy of the benefit illustration and I understand the benefits including the surrender values and maturity
values (if any). I am aware that a copy of this benefit illustration would be included in my policy documents that would
be sent to me subsequent to the issuance of the policy that I have applied for.
I understand and acknowledge my duty of disclosure and agree to inform Dai-ichi Life promptly of any changes in my
health, occupation, hobbies, or any other factors that may affect the underwriting decision of this policy, from the date
of this application until the policy is issued.
By signing below, I/We hereby acknowledge that I/We have completely read and fully understand everything as stated
in this Proposal Form.
